content: create show stopping mini crochet stocking decorations to adorn your festive season with 5 different designs to choose from that use the same easy toe up construction you can go wild with colour and festive fun t his pdf pattern features five unique mosaic crochet designs to make breathtaking crochet stockings that are colorful seamless and full of personality this is a crochet pattern for the mini yuletide mosaic crochet stockings the stockings are crocheted using us single_crochet and double_crochet stitches in the round using the overlay mosaic crochet technique you can use them as hanging christmas tree decorations cutlery and table place holders a mini festive garland and even a stocking advent calendar *please note*-- this listing is for a pdf pattern written in english not a finished product pattern features size 2 25 wide x 6 25 at longest point 5 7cm x 15 8cm skill level intermediate but the included tutorial makes it accessible for adventurous beginners too stitch double_crochet and single_crochet instant pdf download including 5 different patterns full video tutorial to support written pattern if you are a visual learner us crochet terms uk stitch conversion chart why you ll love this pattern toe-up construction crafted seamlessly from the toe to the cuff for a polished finish five unique mosaic designs choose from five distinct patterns to add variety and charm to your holiday décor customizable & fun pick your favorite color combinations to suit your style or gift recipients quick and easy -
